# ShadcnShip

> Free, production-ready Shadcn UI blocks and components. Copy, customize, and ship your project faster.

## About

ShadcnShip is a free, open-source collection of 30+ UI blocks built with Shadcn UI, Tailwind CSS, and TypeScript. Designed for developers who want to ship landing pages and web apps faster without building common sections from scratch.

All components are fully accessible, responsive, and MIT licensed for personal and commercial use.

## Website

https://shadcnship.com

## Key Pages

- https://shadcnship.com/blocks - Browse all blocks and components
- https://shadcnship.com/blocks?category=hero - Hero sections (5 variants)
- https://shadcnship.com/blocks?category=feature - Feature sections (5 variants)
- https://shadcnship.com/blocks?category=pricing - Pricing tables (3 variants)
- https://shadcnship.com/blocks?category=cta - Call to action blocks (4 variants)
- https://shadcnship.com/blocks?category=faq - FAQ sections (2 variants)
- https://shadcnship.com/blocks?category=testimonial - Testimonials (2 variants)
- https://shadcnship.com/blocks?category=navbar - Navigation bars
- https://shadcnship.com/blocks?category=footer - Footer sections
- https://shadcnship.com/blocks?category=login - Login forms
- https://shadcnship.com/blocks?category=contact - Contact forms
- https://shadcnship.com/blocks?category=background - Background patterns

## Available Blocks

### Hero Sections
hero-01, hero-02, hero-03, hero-04, hero-05

### Feature Sections
feature-01, feature-02, feature-03, feature-04, feature-05

### Pricing Tables
pricing-01, pricing-02, pricing-03

### Call to Action
cta-01, cta-02, cta-03, cta-04

### FAQ Sections
faq-01, faq-02

### Testimonials
testimonial-01, testimonial-02

### Statistics
stat-01, stat-02

### Navigation & Layout
navbar-01, footer-01, logo-01

### Forms & Auth
login-01, register-01, contact-01

### Other
team-01, blog-01, social-icons, background-01, background-02, background-03, background-04

## How to Use

### Option 1: CLI Installation (Recommended)
```bash
npx shadcn@latest add https://shadcnship.com/r/[block-name].json
```

Example:
```bash
npx shadcn@latest add https://shadcnship.com/r/hero-01.json
```

### Option 2: Copy & Paste
1. Visit https://shadcnship.com/blocks
2. Click on any block to preview
3. Copy the code directly into your project

## Tech Stack

- **Framework**: React, Next.js 15+
- **Language**: TypeScript
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS
- **Components**: Shadcn UI (built on Radix UI)
- **Accessibility**: WAI-ARIA compliant

## Compatibility

Works with any React-based framework:
- Next.js
- Remix
- Vite
- Astro
- Gatsby

Requirements: Tailwind CSS configured in your project.
